name: Find the Missing Number
description:
In this kata, you will implement a function that takes in a list of integers and returns the missing number in the list.

The list of integers will always be in ascending order and will contain at least two elements. One of the integers will be missing. Your task is to find the missing integer.

Example

findMissingNumber([1, 3, 4, 5])
The missing number is 2, so the function should return 2.

findMissingNumber([2, 3, 4, 6, 7, 8])
The missing number is 5, so the function should return 5.

Constraints
The list of integers will contain at least two elements and at most 10^5 elements.
The integers in the list will be in the range [1, 10^5].

Note
The list of integers will always be in ascending order.
There will always be exactly one missing integer.
